sources.title: Japoteurs (1942)
sources.description: Superman vs. Japanese spies hijacking a new super-bomber. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/japoteurs-1942/

metadata.Plot: American industry builds a gigantic new bomber and Lois Lane stows away on the test flight; little does she suspect, Japanese spies are aboard to hijack the giant. Superman to the rescue?
metadata.Director: Seymour Kneitel, Dave Fleischer, Myron Waldman
metadata.Writer: Jerry Siegel, Joe Shuster, Bill Turner
metadata.Actors: Joan Alexander, Jackson Beck, Jack Mercer
